thig5.8:1.1: I gave birth to ten sons
thig5.8:1.2: in this form, this bag of bones.
thig5.8:2.2: the aggregates, sense fields, and elements.
thig5.8:2.4: I cut off my hair and went forth.
thig5.8:3.1: When I was a trainee nun,
thig5.8:3.3: and I knew my past lives,
thig5.8:3.4: the places I used to live.
thig5.8:5.1: The five aggregates are fully understood;
thig5.8:5.2: they remain, but their root is cut.
thig5.8:5.4: now there’ll be no more future lives.
